at the beginning of your upkeep cardname deals n damage to each creature and each player

at the beginning of your upkeep if you control a basecolor or basecolor permanent cardname deals n damage to target creature if you control a basecolor permanent and a basecolor permanent cardname deals n damage instead
at the beginning of your upkeep cardname deals damage to any target equal to the number of shrines you control
at the beginning of your upkeep cardname deals n damage to any target if you're the monarch it deals n damage instead
at the beginning of each player's upkeep cardname deals x damage to that player where x is the number of untapped lands they controlled at the beginning of this turn
at the beginning of each player's upkeep cardname deals damage to that player equal to the number of artifacts they control
at the beginning of each opponent's upkeep cardname deals damage to that player equal to the number of cards in that player's hand
at the beginning of your upkeep cardname deals x damage to target opponent where x is the number of cards in your hand minus the number of cards in that player's hand
at the beginning of your upkeep choose one
at the beginning of your upkeep cardname deals n damage to you
at the beginning of each player's upkeep cardname deals n damage to them
at the beginning of your upkeep scry n
at the beginning of your upkeep cardname deals n damage to any target
at the beginning of your upkeep cardname deals n damage to enchanted creature
cardname deals n damage to target creature
cardname deals n damage to any target
cardname deals n damage to each creature
cardname deals n damage to each opponent
cardname deals n damage to each player
